title: codehtcmail
author: codehtcmail
content: Seeing how Aptos is pumping like crazy, I wanted to see of I can get in in on the ICO of the project of the other team from Meta preparing a crypto.Any newd or infos on Sui launch or ICO ?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on January 26, 2023, 11:58:32 AMSeeing how Aptos is pumping like crazy, I wanted to see of I can get in in on the ICO of the project of the other team from Meta preparing a crypto.Any newd or infos on Sui launch or ICO ?I have never heard of that project. If it's another ICO then that's most likely not going to get much attention. And not jus because that Aptos is pumping and there's like a hype that's happening with it, I don't think that you should ever compare it with other project that gets you interested with.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on January 26, 2023, 11:58:32 AMSeeing how Aptos is pumping like crazy, I wanted to see of I can get in in on the ICO of the project of the other team from Meta preparing a crypto.Any newd or infos on Sui launch or ICO ?There will be no ICO for sui. ICO will be only available for people who have been contributing a lot and listed as a part of community access program. You can read article that I have mentioned below to get more information about that. https://sui.io/resources-sui/community-access-program/I bought aptos when the price was dipping. It was around $3.2 got 10k aptos after converted some of my assets to the aptos and making 6x easily. It's better if you are joining the sui discord too for the more information.

comments.author: codehtcmail
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on January 26, 2023, 01:29:51 PMQuote from: codehtcmail on January 26, 2023, 11:58:32 AMSeeing how Aptos is pumping like crazy, I wanted to see of I can get in in on the ICO of the project of the other team from Meta preparing a crypto.Any newd or infos on Sui launch or ICO ?I have never heard of that project. If it's another ICO then that's most likely not going to get much attention. And not jus because that Aptos is pumping and there's like a hype that's happening with it, I don't think that you should ever compare it with other project that gets you interested with.I know what you're saying is correvt, but investors and buyers want developpers with a track record, and believe me when people hear Sui is from a team that was working in Meta, same as the team behind Aptos and seeing how it launched, they will be throwing money at them.When launching Ethereum what is Vitalik without his early Bitcoin contribution ? What is Charlie Lee without his pas work at Google when making Litecoin ?

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Why you're not following "ICO" site?Or the best way, to follow a launchpad site. At least with a launchpad platform, you will get 2 due diligence .1. From the check team launchpad2. And from your own research.By the way, there is no guarantee. If the previous or other ICO/IEO is success and the next one is also success, you should know that and always with some risk management.

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: There is not much news with SUI I have searched the internet and the only article I found is: https://u.today/sui-network-inches-closer-to-its-long-awaited-launch-with-this-new-protocol-upgradeI assume that joining a community hub such as discord will give you much more information. And there will be no ICO for SUIBest regard

comments.author: Hildentine
comments.body: I think SUI is a new project i haven't any information about sui project but i heard that many Airdrops events are ongoing that time so if sui launch so i wish its a good project in future but this time I can't see any news about sui ico .

comments.author: irsykes
comments.body: I followed the progress of the SUI testnet and until now stopped working on it. lots of airdrops but no money just a collection that i got till now. many hope that this SUI can produce an airdrop like APTOS. What I see is Ann Medium, they will distribute their tokens in the amount of 250 per active validator with a large amount of supply, it is not certain or there will be changes

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: Hildentine on January 27, 2023, 04:17:32 PMI think SUI is a new project i haven't any information about sui project but i heard that many Airdrops events are ongoing that time so if sui launch so i wish its a good project in future but this time I can't see any news about sui ico .You will get bunch of news related to the sui as long as you were joining its social media. People are too lazy to join and ask admin about the possibility of the ico to happen. You're also lazy too. Why don't you go to the official site and then try to join in the official group to get the latest news about sui? so many people these days are so lazy. I have even mentioned about the possibility for sui to launch ico.
